title: #351 Clammy Cloud
description:
We've got a hot one for ya here folks, Mark hits a million views on his special before offending his house mates in Connecticut while Joe gets caught in a rain storm while running. We also tell some classic stories from out pasts! Check it out!

Sponsored by: Sheath (sheathunderwear.com code: tuesdays) & Feals CBD (feals.com/tuesdays)

Subscribe to our Patreon for full video of the show, bonus eps, and all of our pre-2017 episodes
www.patreon.com/tuesdays

Get our new T-Shirts right here baby!
remember2behappy.com/twsshop
